subject: Ethics
title: Intimate Image Abuse and Consent
description: One-minute skill: Intimate Image Abuse and Consent.

hook.text: One in eight social media users has been threatened with intimate image sharing. It's not about sex â€” it's power.

buildup.text: Sharing intimate images without consent weaponizes trust. Victims face job loss, harassment, and lasting trauma.

discovery.text: 46 US states now have revenge porn laws. But enforcement is slow, and images spread faster than any court order.

twist.text: AI can now generate fake intimate images of anyone from ordinary photos. You don't even need a real image to harm.

climax.text: Technology outpaced consent. Creating legal protection is a constant race against tools that violate boundaries.

punchline.text: Consent given once doesn't mean consent given forever.

quiz.question: What new threat has AI created in the intimate image abuse space?
options: AI blocks all intimate images automatically
AI can generate fake intimate images from ordinary photos
AI identifies and arrests offenders instantly
